name: Xerva
description:
Xerva knows that reports are only as good as the data they sit on. Created in Silicon Slopes Utah, Xerva builds data warehouses that bring order to data chaos.  Using their proven 5 step model they take data from any source into one easy-to-access cloud database that is compatible with any visualization tool (Tableau, Power BI, Excel, etc.).  By ordering data with proven methods, non-technical professionals can build reports with ease, on their own, and from a single source.
 With "Data First" as their mantra, Xerva believes that the power of visualization tools is only unlocked after data is modeled correctly.  With all the hype around BI, Xerva cuts through the noise with a grounded approach and clear, up-front pricing.
